Articles.Content:
Hello

This mod does not longer exist: I read it should be included in the stock parts.

I don't see in the stock parts any MK2-MK3 fuselage nor MK2 or 3 cargo bay nor the other parts.

Where is it?

Have you downloaded latest version of KSP (0.90) from the Store/Steam?

If you have updated with the stock patcher maybe you encountered in a common bug that won't download new folders, i suggest you to download a "fresh" zip from Store or a clean install from Steam

Keep in mind mk3 has changed:

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Mk3_to_Mk2_Adapter

That is listed under fuel tanks

The cargobays are under utility

Have you downloaded latest version of KSP (0.90) from the Store/Steam?

If you have updated with the stock patcher maybe you encountered in a common bug that won't download new folders, i suggest you to download a "fresh" zip from Store or a clean install from Steam

Well, I downloaded the whole new version.

I am gonig to check that

Thank's
I suppose that raises a question - are the old Spaceplane Plus parts still available? They weren't quite the same as the stock parts after all.
I've still got a zip from the 0.24 release.

Yes you can still download the files from Curse. I had to do that recently as i had a problem with the IVA's not showing up and i have modded alot of the stock files, so i did not want to do a clean install so i just added the IVA's from the Space plane plus into my existing games files.

SPP is redundant now with 0.90. Yes the SPP parts are different (follow older game's MK2 style), but the stock game has most of these included, and the MK-3 are now useful and unique, unlike the old MK-3 that was useless for all intents and purposes.
